fn into_pidfd(mut self) -> Result<os::PidFd, Self> {
            self.handle
                .pidfd
                .take()
                .map(|fd| <os::PidFd as FromInner<imp::PidFd>>::from_inner(fd))
                .ok_or_else(|| self)
        }
